JOB DESCRIPTION: We are hiring for a full-time Full Stack Engineer with AWS experience developing services along with the front end components that will be relying on them. A successful candidate will have experience developing and supporting a large and diverse set of applications.You will have a deep understanding of your preferred development stack and the ability to make and explain solid technical decisions when it comes to choosing the right tools/libraries/etc for the task at hand. You will know how to write clean and robust code with a focus on simplicity, maintainability, and extensibility.You will have a knack for testing applications to ensure that they work as expected. Our ideal candidate enjoys the challenge of navigating a fast-paced growth environment. What makes you a good fit:Experience with AWS services (or a good understanding of cloud services and a strong willingness to learn)Experience building full stack applications, and knowledge of one of more Javascript frameworks (React, Angular, etc.)Experience working with Javascript, Node or PythonExperience building highly scalable services and APIsKnowledge of database modeling with NoSQL/SQL databasesAbility to make good technical decisions that will shape our earliest product iterationsEagerness to jump in to new environments and learn through experience. We greatly value developers who can learn new skills and technologies when needed.Comfortable working remotely with minimal supervision
